      • getClosestObject

        public GameObject getClosestObject(Vector2D position,
                                   java.lang.Float maxDistance)
        Parameters:
        position - Position.
        maxDistance - Max distance to allow the object to be from position. Not used if null.
        Returns:
        Object closest to position, optionally no further than maxDistance. Can be null.

      • getClosestItem

        public GameItem getClosestItem(Vector2D position,
                               java.util.EnumSet<GameSceneController.ItemFilter> filters,
                               java.lang.Float maxDistance)
        Equivalent to calling getClosestItem(position, filters, maxDistance, position)
        Parameters:
        position - Position.
        filters - Item filters.
        maxDistance - Max distance to allow the object to be from position. Not used if null.
        Returns:
        Item closest to position that passes item filters, optionally no further than maxDistance. Can be null.
        See Also:
        getClosestItem(Vector2D, EnumSet, Float, Vector2D)

      • getClosestItem

        public GameItem getClosestItem(Vector2D position,
                               java.util.EnumSet<GameSceneController.ItemFilter> filters,
                               java.lang.Float maxDistance,
                               Vector2D maxDistanceSource)
        This method is usefull if you need to select the closest item to a point, but it also needs to be in close proximity to mouse cursor. Setting maxDistanceSource to cursor position and maxDistance to some radius allows you to select items closest to some point with mouse.
        Parameters:
        position - Position.
        filters - Item filters.
        maxDistance - Max distance to allow the object to be from maxDistanceSource. Not used if null.
        maxDistanceSource - Point from which to calculate distance for maxDistance.
        Returns:
        Item closest to position that passed item filters. This item also also has to be in maxDistance radius around maxDistanceSource. Can be null.

      • getClosestCharacter

        public GameCharacter getClosestCharacter(Vector2D position)
        Parameters:
        position - Position.
        Returns:
        Character closest to position. Can be null.

      • getClosestCharacter

        public GameCharacter getClosestCharacter(GameCharacter me,
                                         GameCharacter.CharacterRelationship filters)
        Parameters:
        me - Character to which to find the closest character.
        filters - Character relationship filter.
        Returns:
        Character that is closest to me and passes filters. Can be null.
